description: Gets the latest version of the DefinitionDocument and FlowTemplateSummary for the specified workflow.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the workflow. The ID should be in the following format. urn:tdm:REGION/ACCOUNT ID/default:workflow:WORKFLOWNAME.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The object that describes the specified workflow.

nested_items.name: revisionNumber
nested_items.description: The revision number of the workflow.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date when the workflow was created.

nested_items.name: language
nested_items.description: The language used to define the entity. GRAPHQL is the only valid value.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: The GraphQL text that defines the entity.

nested_items.name: validatedNamespaceVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the user's namespace against which the workflow was validated. Use this value in your system instance.
